wikipedia_page.main: Adam McClean (born c. 1989) is a British journalist, broadcaster and filmmaker who works for the BBC. He presents national television news items for BBC Breakfast and BBC News. He is also credited as having worked on Panorama. He spent his early career working for ITV on Granada Reports.

response: * Adam McClean, BBC Breakfast and BBC News journalist
* Adam McClean – BBC Breakfast and BBC News journalist (founded college TV station Winstanley TV)
* Adam McClean (born c. 1989), British journalist and broadcaster
